content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I previously received a command to read "README.md" in the directory "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/halflife-regression". The command returned information about Half-Life Regression, including a link to the paper that introduced it, a description of the software used to implement it, and a data set available for download. As a user, I also read "lexeme_reference.txt" and received a list of lexemes and their attributes. In the latest development, I received a command to Google the "best language learning resources".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language", "https://www.alllanguageresources.com/", "https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-best-language-learning-resources", "https://www.lingualift.com/blog/best-language-learning-resources/", "https://nymag.com/strategist/article/how-to-learn-languages-at-home.html", "https://www.mezzoguild.com/tools/", "https://www.fluentu.com/blog/online-language-learning-for-kids/"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "question": "What are the top language learning resources?"}}}'}]
"""
